segments.text: What a typical kitchen scene, but something's off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look like a classic homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at that faucet—it's running full blast into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's spilling everywhere, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle, oblivious to the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinet doors are getting ruined by the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, over by the cabinets, kids are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could collapse and hurt him badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting there, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies behind her back—such naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole room could turn into a disaster zone soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
